meanings.definition: Not reducing in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The nonreducing cake remained the same size after baking.
meanings.sent2: The nonreducing tree grew taller each year.
meanings.sent3: The nonreducing balloon refused to shrink, much to the children's delight.
meanings.sent4: Her nonreducing love for him only seemed to grow stronger with time.
meanings.sent5: The nonreducing rock stood steadfast against the erosion of time.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being reduced or simplified.
meanings.sent1: The nonreducing equation puzzled the students with its complexity.
meanings.sent2: The nonreducing contract required careful attention to every detail.
meanings.sent3: The nonreducing puzzle seemed to have pieces that multiplied overnight!
meanings.sent4: His nonreducing stubbornness made it hard to reach a compromise.
meanings.sent5: The nonreducing maze of corridors left them lost for hours.

meanings.definition: Not causing a reduction in something else.
meanings.sent1: The nonreducing fertilizer actually increased the crop yield.
meanings.sent2: The nonreducing energy source provided sustainable power for the town.
meanings.sent3: The nonreducing rain only added to the already flooded streets.
meanings.sent4: His nonreducing enthusiasm for the project inspired the whole team.
meanings.sent5: The nonreducing kindness of the stranger left a lasting impact on her.
